name: Pendulum Dimension
desc:
If you Special Summon a monster of the below card types using a Pendulum Monster(s) as material while this card is already face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone: You can apply the appropriate effect (but you cannot apply that same effect of "Pendulum Dimension" again this turn).
● Fusion: Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with the same original Level as that Fusion Monster in Defense Position, but negate its effects.
● Synchro: Add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.
● Xyz: Take 1 Tuner from your Deck whose Level is less than or equal to that Xyz Monster's Rank, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.
